channel.title: Resources on edouard.paris
channel.description: Recent content in Resources on edouard.paris

item.description: The Lightning Conference 2019 10:10 Enterprise Lightning FTW - Jameson Lopp 10:30 Make me an offer: Next Level Invoicing - Rusty Russell 11:00 How much Better Could Lightning Be? - Fabrice Drouin 11:20 pAMP it - Conner Fromknecht 11:40 Of Channels, Flows and Icebergs - Christian Decker 12:00 LSAT: Your Ticket Aboard the Internet’s Money Rails - Olaoluwa Osuntokun 13:30 Building a More Friendly Lightning User Experience - Will O’Beirne 13:50 Hedging the Chain - Jack Mallers 16:00 Lightning x Liquidity, Or A Financier’s Guide to Staking Bitcoin - Lisa Neigut 17:00 Lightning integration in Electrum - Thomas Voegtlin
